Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.actionSystem

Interface ActionPlan


  • public interface ActionPlan
    Combined text/caret model that is used to record oncoming changes before acquiring a write lock and making actual changes to Document or CaretModel.

    The draft is used to perform preemptive rendering in editor before acquiring a write lock.

    The interface is simplistic and can be extended later to support multiple carets, selection, etc.

    See Also:
    TypedAction.beforeActionPerformed(Editor, char, DataContext, ActionPlan)
